mapper.select: select u.id as user_id, d.name as dept_name, w.name as worker_name, u.username, w.mobile_phone, w.wx_cp_user_id, u.status from sys_user u inner join sys_worker w on u.worker_id = w.id inner join sys_dept_worker dw on dw.worker_id = w.id and dw.status = 'a' inner join sys_dept d on d.id = dw.dept_id where d.id = #{deptId}

select u.id, w.name, d.name as dept_name from sys_user u inner join sys_worker w on u.worker_id = w.id inner join sys_dept_worker dw on dw.worker_id = w.id and dw.status = 'a' inner join sys_dept d on d.id = dw.dept_id where d.org_id = #{orgId}

select w.name worker_name, w.gender, w.pic, o.name org_name, d.name dept_name, u.username from sys_user u inner join sys_worker w on u.worker_id = w.id inner join sys_dept_worker dw on dw.worker_id = w.id inner join sys_dept d on d.id = dw.dept_id inner join sys_org o on o.id = d.org_id where u.id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM sys_user su WHERE su.username = #{username} GROUP BY su.id, su.username, su. PASSWORD

select su.id as user_id, su.worker_id, su.username, su.password, if(su.status = 'a', true, false) as enabled, sw.name, sw.mobile_phone, sd.id as dept_id, sd.org_id, group_concat(sm.permitted_ant_uris separator ',') as permitted_ant_uris from sys_user su join sys_worker sw on su.worker_id = sw.id join sys_dept_worker sdw on su.worker_id = sdw.worker_id and sdw.status = 'a' join sys_dept sd on sd.id = sdw.dept_id join sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id join sys_role sr on sr.id = sur.role_id join sys_role_menu srm on sur.role_id = srm.role_id join sys_menu sm on sm.id = srm.menu_id and sm.type = '2' where sw.mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone} group by su.id, su.username, su.password, sw.name, sd.id

select su.id as user_id, su.worker_id, su.username, su.password, if(su.status = 'a', true, false) as enabled, sw.name, sw.mobile_phone, sd.id as dept_id, sd.org_id, group_concat(sm.permitted_ant_uris separator ',') as permitted_ant_uris from sys_user su join sys_worker sw on su.worker_id = sw.id join sys_dept_worker sdw on su.worker_id = sdw.worker_id and sdw.status = 'a' join sys_dept sd on sd.id = sdw.dept_id join sys_user_role sur on su.id = sur.user_id join sys_role sr on sr.id = sur.role_id join sys_role_menu srm on sur.role_id = srm.role_id join sys_menu sm on sm.id = srm.menu_id and sm.type = '2' where su.id = #{userId} group by su.id, su.username, su.password, sw.name, sd.id
